caseStudies.title: Gridix Implementation Cases
caseStudies.description: Real examples of sales growth after implementation

batumi.title: Batumi
batumi.problem: Excel tables are often outdated, clients get lost in floor plans and ask many repeated questions.
batumi.solution: Interactive floor plan with filters, layouts, and CRM integration, available in three languages.
batumi.result1: Sales department saves up to 40% of time
batumi.result2: Clients submit more applications through the website

izmir.title: Izmir
izmir.problem: Managers spend hours daily answering requests like 'send the floor plan' and 'send PDF'.
izmir.solution: Online floor plan with auto-generated PDF and real-time status updates.
izmir.result2: Save up to 4 hours per day
izmir.result3: Increased trust thanks to up-to-date data

dubai.title: Dubai

becomePartner.question: How do I become a partner?
becomePartner.answer: Click 'Become a Partner', register ‚Äî the link is available immediately. Choose a format: simple referral (20%) or full implementation (40-50%).

firstPayout.question: When will I receive my first payout?
firstPayout.answer: After the client pays. Minimum withdrawal is $100, processing time up to 7 days. You can see all data in your account in real-time.

integratorRequirements.question: What do I need to become an integrator?
integratorRequirements.answer: Actively implement and manage clients. After 5‚Äì10 projects, you move to the 40‚Äì50% commission level with full team support.

shareLink.question: Can I just share a link?
shareLink.answer: Yes, this is the basic partnership format with 20% commission. Perfect for marketers and consultants who have contacts with developers.

support.question: Is there support?
support.answer: Yes, Telegram chat and materials are available 24/7. You get access to presentations, templates, webinars, and demo accounts.

salesIncrease.question: How much can sales increase?
salesIncrease.answer: Results depend on the project, but on average our clients see 20-40% growth. Manager time savings amount to 2-4 hours per day thanks to automation.

setupTime.question: How much time is needed for setup?
setupTime.answer: Basic floor plan is set up in 1 day. For full implementation with CRM integrations, it may take 3-5 days depending on project complexity.

languages.question: Does Gridix support other languages?
languages.answer: Yes, the platform supports English, Russian, Georgian, Turkish, and Arabic. You can set up a multilingual widget for international projects.

crmIntegration.question: Which CRMs integrate with Gridix?
crmIntegration.answer: We integrate with popular CRM systems and support Webhooks for custom integrations. You can see the full list of integrations in your account.

profitExample.question: Give an example of partner income?
profitExample.answer: If you as a basic partner brought in 5 clients with an average deal of $500/month, your income is $500 (20% √ó 5 √ó $500). Integrators with 10+ clients can earn $2500+ per month.

finalCta.title: Ready to start earning?
finalCta.description: Join the growing network of Gridix partners. Your first income could be this month.
